languages.text: {n}Абеляр несколько смущенно запускает большие пальцы за пояс.{/n} "Раз у меня есть ваше высочайшее дозволение — пришло время заняться своей семьей. Слишком долго род Версериан перебивался без своего патриарха — надо уделить время потомкам, пока какая-нибудь дворянская выскочка не собралась их опять сожрать".

{n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр несколько смущенно запускает большие пальцы за пояс.{/n} "Раз у меня есть ваше высочайшее дозволение — пришло время заняться своей семьей. Слишком долго род Версериан перебивался без своего патриарха — надо уделить время потомкам, пока какая-нибудь дворянская выскочка не собралась их опять сожрать".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德有些尴尬，将拇指插在腰带里。{/n}“既然我已经得到了您的祝福，那是时候照顾一下我的家人了。韦尔森家族的族长已经太久没回去过了。我应该为我的子孙后代争取些时间，以免某些贵族再打算搞什么阴谋诡计。”
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德有些尴尬，将拇指插在腰带里。{/n}“既然我已经得到了您的祝福，那是时候照顾一下我的家人了。韦尔森家族的族长已经太久没回去过了。我应该为我的子孙后代争取些时间，以免某些贵族再打算搞什么阴谋诡计。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Algo avergonzado, Abelard mete los pulgares entre el cinturón y el pantalón.{/n} «Ahora que me ha dado su bendición, es hora de que cuide de mi familia. El clan Werserian lleva demasiado tiempo privado de su patriarca, y debería dedicarles más tiempo a mis descendientes antes de que algún noble insensato vuelva a intentar aprovecharse de ello».
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo avergonzado, Abelard mete los pulgares entre el cinturón y el pantalón.{/n} «Ahora que me ha dado su bendición, es hora de que cuide de mi familia. El clan Werserian lleva demasiado tiempo privado de su patriarca, y debería dedicarles más tiempo a mis descendientes antes de que algún noble insensato vuelva a intentar aprovecharse de ello».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは少し照れくさそうに、親指をベルトの中に押し込んだ。{/n}「あなたの祝福を得たので、家族の面倒を見ようと思います。ウェルザリアン一族は長きにわたって教父不在の状態が続いており、またどこかの成り上がりの貴族につぶされる前に、子孫存続のために時間を作らねばなりませんから」
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは少し照れくさそうに、親指をベルトの中に押し込んだ。{/n}「あなたの祝福を得たので、家族の面倒を見ようと思います。ウェルザリアン一族は長きにわたって教父不在の状態が続いており、またどこかの成り上がりの貴族につぶされる前に、子孫存続のために時間を作らねばなりませんから」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Etwas verlegen steckt Abelard seine Daumen in seinen Gürtel.{/n} "Nachdem ich nun Euren Segen habe, wird es Zeit, dass ich mich um meine Familie kümmere. Der Werserian-Clan muss schon zu lange auf seinen Patriarchen verzichten, ich sollte mir daher Zeit für meine Nachfahren nehmen, bevor erneut ein adliger Emporkömmling versucht, sie zu zerfleischen."
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas verlegen steckt Abelard seine Daumen in seinen Gürtel.{/n} "Nachdem ich nun Euren Segen habe, wird es Zeit, dass ich mich um meine Familie kümmere. Der Werserian-Clan muss schon zu lange auf seinen Patriarchen verzichten, ich sollte mir daher Zeit für meine Nachfahren nehmen, bevor erneut ein adliger Emporkömmling versucht, sie zu zerfleischen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Quelque peu embarrassé, Abélard passe ses pouces dans sa ceinture.{/n} « Maintenant que j'ai votre bénédiction, l'heure est venue pour moi de prendre soin de ma famille. Le clan Werserian est privé de son patriarche depuis trop longtemps ; il me faut prendre le temps de veiller sur ma descendance avant que quelque aristocrate aux dents longues ne cherche à la faire disparaître à nouveau. »
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque peu embarrassé, Abélard passe ses pouces dans sa ceinture.{/n} « Maintenant que j'ai votre bénédiction, l'heure est venue pour moi de prendre soin de ma famille. Le clan Werserian est privé de son patriarche depuis trop longtemps ; il me faut prendre le temps de veiller sur ma descendance avant que quelque aristocrate aux dents longues ne cherche à la faire disparaître à nouveau. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelar biraz utangaç bir edayla başparmaklarını kemerine geçiriyor.{/n} "Madem izninize sahibim, ailemle ilgilenmemin zamanı geldi. Werserian klanının reisi uzun zamandır klanından uzak kaldı. Soylu bir zıpçıktı onları yine kemirmeye başlamadan önce ailemin gençleri için zaman ayırmalıyım."
languages.original_text: {n}Somewhat embarrassed, Abelard tucks his thumbs into his belt.{/n} "Now that I have your blessing, it is about time I took care of my family. The Werserian clan has gone without its patriarch for too long, I should make time for my descendants before some noble upstart tries to chew them up again."
